statements: SELECT * FROM failed_authentication_logs;
SELECT id, username, attempted_timestamp FROM failed_authentication_logs;
SELECT * FROM failed_authentication_logs WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT id, username, attempted_timestamp, error_message FROM failed_authentication_logs WHERE username = 'user123';
SELECT * FROM failed_authentication_logs ORDER BY attempted_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM failed_authentication_logs ORDER BY attempted_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, username, ip_address FROM failed_authentication_logs WHERE username='admin' AND ip_address='192.168.1.1';
SELECT id, username, attempted_timestamp FROM failed_authentication_logs WHERE attempted_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY attempted_timestamp ASC;
SELECT username, ip_address, error_message FROM failed_authentication_logs WHERE error_message ILIKE '%invalid%' ORDER BY attempted_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM failed_authentication_logs WHERE ip_address='127.0.0.1' OR error_message IS NOT NULL ORDER BY attempted_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM failed_authentication_log;
SELECT username, timestamp, ip_address FROM failed_authentication_log WHERE id = 1;
SELECT threat_description FROM security_threats WHERE severity > 5;
SELECT id, error_message FROM failed_authentication_log WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM security_threats ORDER BY severity DESC;
SELECT * FROM failed_authentication_log WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, timestamp FROM failed_authentication_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, username, ip_address, timestamp FROM failed_authentication_log WHERE ip_address LIKE '192.168%';
SELECT threat_description, severity FROM security_threats WHERE severity > 5 ORDER BY severity DESC;
SELECT id, username, timestamp, ip_address, error_message FROM failed_authentication_log WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM auth_attempts;
SELECT username, timestamp FROM auth_attempts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT ip_address, COUNT(*) as count FROM auth_failure_logs GROUP BY ip_address HAVING count > 1;
SELECT * FROM potential_threats WHERE detected_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, timestamp FROM auth_attempts WHERE username = 'admin' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM auth_attempts WHERE username = 'user1' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, ip_address FROM auth_failure_logs WHERE log_id > 100 ORDER BY failed_timestamp ASC;
SELECT log_id, error_message FROM auth_failure_logs WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.100' LIMIT 5;
SELECT threat_id, threat_description, detected_timestamp FROM potential_threats WHERE threat_description LIKE '%malware%' ORDER BY detected_timestamp DESC;

SELECT * FROM auth_attempts JOIN auth_failure_logs ON auth_attempts.username = auth_failure_logs.username WHERE auth_attempts.ip_address = '10.0.0.1' AND auth_attempts.timestamp < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY auth_attempts.timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM failed_authentication_attempts;
SELECT attempt_id, username FROM failed_authentication_attempts WHERE attempt_date > timestamp '2022-01-01';
SELECT role_name, description FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, alert_timestamp FROM security_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'intrusion' ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM failed_authentication_attempts;
SELECT username, ip_address FROM failed_authentication_attempts WHERE attempt_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT role_name, description FROM roles WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM security_alerts WHERE alert_type LIKE 'Unauthorized%' ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM failed_logins;
SELECT username, ip_address FROM user_accounts;
SELECT attempt_id, ip_address, timestamp FROM login_attempts WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT username, timestamp FROM security_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT ip_address, block_reason FROM blocked_ips WHERE block_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM failed_logins WHERE reason LIKE '%banned%';
SELECT username, ip_address, timestamp FROM login_attempts WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, COUNT(*) AS login_attempts FROM login_attempts GROUP BY username HAVING login_attempts > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT ip_address, COUNT(*) AS blocked_count FROM blocked_ips GROUP BY ip_address HAVING blocked_count > 1 ORDER BY blocked_count DESC;
SELECT user_accounts.username, security_logs.log_message FROM user_accounts INNER JOIN security_logs ON user_accounts.last_login < security_logs.timestamp;
